academic_journey.title: Secondary
academic_journey.lead:
Completed the 12th year of schooling in the Scientific-Humanistic Science and Technology Course at Artur Gonçalves School Group in Torres Novas, Portugal. 
 Graduated with a final average of 16.2 (out of 20), reflecting my dedication, strong academic performance, and passion for science and technology.

academic_journey.title: Degree
academic_journey.lead:
I have completed my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science Engineering at the University of Évora, at the Verney campus. 
 I started the course in 2022 and graduated in 2025. 
 Grade average value of 15.15 out of 20. 
 During my time at university, I developed solid knowledge in areas like programming, computer systems, and software development. 
 Studying in Évora helped me grow both technically and academically through hands-on work and team projects.

academic_journey.title: Master's degree
academic_journey.lead:
I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Informatics and Management at ISCTE - University Institute of Lisbon. 
 The program is part-time and designed for working professionals, allowing me to deepen my knowledge and skills while balancing other commitments.

internship.title: Digital Works
internship.lead:
I completed a 4-month internship at Digital Works, where I worked with PHP, CSS, HTML, WordPress (including the Divi theme), and JavaScript (jQuery). 
During this time, I gained valuable hands-on experience in full-stack development and improved my skills through internal tasks and training exercises within a professional environment.
